overview: Before joining Monashees Capital, Marcelo worked at Roland Berger, an international management consulting, for 4 years in projects related to corporate strategy, client segmentation, business intelligence and business planning mainly in financial services, payments and energy. As an entrepreneur he led and developed several projects for new ventures working as a principal at his college junior enterprise. He holds a B.S. in Computer Engineering at ITA and a Corporate Finance degree at UC Berkeley.
